customer_reviews.title: Knobs need work.
customer_reviews.text: As another said, once the knobs are figured out, its fine. Those knobs, though. I have a hard time with them. Have to use my glasses. The rest of the design is excellent. Nifty door like an old roll-top desk. But those knobs. It shouldn't be so difficult to zoom in on light or dark toast. Settings for other functions are easier - time and temp. But perfect toast is eluding me so far. It died in late October of 2018, so it lasted about a year longer than the warrenty. Not bad. But I think I'll try a Black&Decker next.
customer_reviews.author: Just Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 2 person home
customer_reviews.text: Gift for daughter. She loves the way the lid opens up to get items in and out of the oven. Perfect size for 2 person home.
customer_reviews.author: GWard3Nana

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea but my product broke after 6 months . . .
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product until the heating unit stopped working after 6 months. Since it was under manufacturers warranty 1-year warranty I expected to get a replacement. Hamilton Beach is offering to send me a replacement, if I pay the shipping charges of $11.49 "because shipping and handling aren't included in the warranty." That is totally ridiculous. I bought their product, it didn't last, now they want more $$ out of me to replace it. And I would bet that the replacement is "refurbished" not brand new. I won't buy anything from HB any more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good size, didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and simplicity of this toaster oven. I loved how the door rolled back without taking up counter space. I did not like how hot the exterior got When in use. No insulation at all. We had to be careful where the cord was, it would have melted if it was in direct contact. Sadly, it only lasted a year and the element stopped working. I am probably going to order another, anyway, because I need that size.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Tyler
